skillTree.localised_description: Whenever the twins present Lord Daith with a new challenge, he simply gives a small smile and returns to the fires of the forge.

effects.description: Daith's Favour: +33% chance to earn additional Daith's Favour after battles

skillTree.localised_description: A ranger should give no reprieve to the foe. Arrows must fall like a deluge, as deadly as lightning.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: Elven hunters emulate Kurnous, the God of the Hunt. Their speed and swiftness is therefore without peer.

skillTree.localised_description: The Lord charges their troops to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Howl of the Forest"

skillTree.localised_description: Waystalkers’ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Sight Beyond Sight"

skillTree.localised_description: Once consumed by Loec’s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.localised_description: Asrai are not numerous so they need to care for each other more than any other children of Asuryan.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can fire while on the move.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
